name: Popeye (1986)
overview: Life's not all a bowl of spinach for Popeye as he hunts for hearts to win the love of Olive Oyl. His rival, the macho Bluto, is not amused. He thumps around making pulp of Popeye. The sailor man's quest for love takes him deep-sea diving, soaring on a flying saucer, deceiving dragons - he even becomes a human cannonball!
